SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_MULTIPLECURRENTFULLBODYATTACHMENTS
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Used to add/delete 'Multiple current photo attachments' pending reasons.
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_MULTIPLECURRENTFULLBODYATTACHMENTS( @childIDList dbo.USR_UDT_CHILDIDLIST readonly, -- The children to be made eligible or pending @changeAgentID uniqueidentifier, -- Used to specify change agent for CHANGEDBYID and ADDEDBYID fields @deletedRows int = 0 output, -- Output parm that specifies how many pending reasons were deleted @insertedRows int = 0 output -- Output parm that specifies how many pending reasons were inserted ) as begin
-- Eligibility code value constants declare @eligibilityCode_Pending tinyint = 0 declare @eligibilityCode_Eligible tinyint = 1 declare @eligibilityCode_Ineligible tinyint = 2
declare @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility tinyint = 0
declare @sponsorshipReason_MultipleCurrentFullBodyAttachments nvarchar(100) = 'Multiple current full body attachments' declare @errorMessageMultipleCurrentFullBodyAttachmentsNotfound nvarchar(500) = 'Couldn''t find the "' + @sponsorshipReason_MultipleCurrentFullBodyAttachments + '" Sponsorship Reason'
declare @sproppAttachmentType_ChildPhotoFullBodyCurrent nvarchar(100) = 'Child Photo - Full Body - Current' declare @errorMessageChildPhotoFullBodyCurrentNotfound nvarchar(500) = 'Couldn''t find the "' + @sproppAttachmentType_ChildPhotoFullBodyCurrent + '" Attachment Type'
-- Get ChangeAgent if none was passed into the sproc if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
-- Used for setting date fields to today's date declare @CurrentDate datetime = null set @CurrentDate = getdate()
begin try -- These are required for the sproc to work correctly, so we need to throw an exception if the IDs aren't found declare @MultipleCurrentFullBodyAttachmentsID uniqueidentifier select @MultipleCurrentFullBodyAttachmentsID = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = lower (@sponsorshipReason_MultipleCurrentFullBodyAttachments) and REASONTYPECODE = @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility if @MultipleCurrentFullBodyAttachmentsID is null raiserror(@errorMessageMultipleCurrentFullBodyAttachmentsNotfound,16,1);
-- get the attachment type code id values we need: declare @fullBodyCurrentAttachmentTypeCodeID uniqueidentifier; select @fullBodyCurrentAttachmentTypeCodeID = ID from dbo.SPROPPATTACHMENTTYPECODE where lower (DESCRIPTION) = lower (@sproppAttachmentType_ChildPhotoFullBodyCurrent) if @fullBodyCurrentAttachmentTypeCodeID is null raiserror(@errorMessageChildPhotoFullBodyCurrentNotfound,16,1);
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR --return 1 end catch
-- This needs to be set to off for the output parms to be set properly set nocount off
-- Remove 'Multiple current full body attachments' pending reasons if there are not more than one Current Photo Full body attachment
delete dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON so_reason
where -- Find children who are specified to be reviewed and have the 'Current photo year does not match full body attachment' pending reason exists (select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID from @childIDList where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = so_reason.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID ) and so_reason.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @MultipleCurrentFullBodyAttachmentsID
-- Check if the child has one or zero Current fullbody attachment and not exists (select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, count(*) from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYATTACHMENT so_att where so_att.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so_reason.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID and so_att.SPROPPATTACHMENTTYPECODEID = @fullBodyCurrentAttachmentTypeCodeID group by SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID having count(*) > 1 )
set @DELETEDROWS = @@ROWCOUNT
-- Insert 'Multiple current full body attachments' pending reasons if there are more than one Current Photo Full body attachment insert dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON (SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, SPONSORSHIPREASONID, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED)
select ID, @MultipleCurrentFullBodyAttachmentsID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CurrentDate, @CurrentDate
from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so
where exists (select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID from @childIDList where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = so.ID )
-- Verify that the children do not already have a 'Current photo year does not match full body attachment' pending reason and not exists (select so_reason.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON so_reason where so_reason.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @MultipleCurrentFullBodyAttachmentsID and so_reason.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID)
-- Check if the child has more than one Current full body attachment and exists (select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, count(*) from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYATTACHMENT so_att where so_att.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID and so_att.SPROPPATTACHMENTTYPECODEID = @fullBodyCurrentAttachmentTypeCodeID group by SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID having count(*) > 1 )
-- Don't add to ineligible kids that are not quota waiting list and (so.ELIGIBILITYCODE in (@eligibilityCode_Pending, @eligibilityCode_Eligible) or (so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Ineligible and exists (select sponsorshipReasonID from dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDQUOTA_GETWAITINGLISTREASONS() wl_reasons where so.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = wl_reasons.sponsorshipReasonID)))
set @INSERTEDROWS = @@ROWCOUNT
end
